name: Bash Foxycut
description:
CONTROLS: Arrows, Space (jump) and right ALT (attack)

A simple demake of a Crash Bandicoot game. It's my first game on a gamejam, very proud ;) I had plans to make it even detailed... but maybe with more experiance next time. Hope this little game give you some fun!

Also thanks for the creators for free assets:

  • Digital Disco - https://www.dafont.com/digital-disco.font
  • Davit Masia - https://kronbits.itch.io/matriax-free-assets
  • Jesse M / Twitter - @Jsf23Art (Jungle pack)
